title: Whoever said these paper straws are "great" must suck back ... - Reddit
body: getawhiffofgriff • 2 yr. ago. I'm about one of the few rare people who drinks things quick enough to not have to deal with soggy paper straws. For me an ice cap is a 5 minute confection. If I don't have water first it's probably a 2 minute slug. With that said - the Tims paper straws feel so robust and thick in the wrapper.
